text:
Complete Genomics - Mountain View, Full time, (H1B transfers)

Ever wish your job had a real impact on the world?

We are building next generation applications in the field of Genomics data interpretation. We believe in having small teams of highly influential engineers who have the resources required to do what needs to be done. If you want to help build solutions that could have a measurable, positive impact on the lives of people, then join our team. And yes, we work on curing cancer.

Backbone/iOS/Java/MongoDB/AWS

- Frontent Software Engineer - http://bit.ly/11ih9WQ
